features: Merrow stitch seam construction reduces seam size
Built in boxer liner gives next-to-skin comfort
6in inseam gives longer length for more coverage
Side split ensures ease of stride
PowerStrech mesh waistband has adjustable drawcord for a comfortable, secure fit
Two deep back hip envelope pockets for secure carry of phone
Reflective elements increase visibility in low light
Crystalis™—87% polyester, 13% elastane. Lightweight, breathable, four-way stretch textile.
